mapper.insert: insert into mr_nodes_monitor( schedule_id, node_id, monitor_date, monitor_ymd, monitor_hour, monitor_minute, monitor_second, monitor_tps, monitor_alarm ) values ( #{scheduleId}, #{nodeId}, #{monitorDate}, #{monitorYmd}, #{monitorHour}, #{monitorMinute}, #{monitorSecond}, #{monitorTps}, #{monitorAlarm} )
mapper.update: update mr_nodes_monitor set schedule_id = #{mrNodesMonitor.scheduleId}, node_id = #{mrNodesMonitor.nodeId}, monitor_date = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorDate}, monitor_ymd = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorYmd}, monitor_hour = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorHour}, monitor_minute = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorMinute}, monitor_second = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorSecond}, monitor_tps = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorTps}, monitor_alarm = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorAlarm} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, schedule_id AS scheduleId, node_id AS nodeId, monitor_date AS monitorDate, monitor_ymd AS monitorYmd, monitor_hour AS monitorHour, monitor_minute AS monitorMinute, monitor_second AS monitorSecond, monitor_tps AS monitorTps, monitor_alarm AS monitorAlarm from mr_nodes_monitor where id = #{id}

select id, schedule_id AS scheduleId, node_id AS nodeId, monitor_date AS monitorDate, monitor_ymd AS monitorYmd, monitor_hour AS monitorHour, monitor_minute AS monitorMinute, monitor_second AS monitorSecond, monitor_tps AS monitorTps, monitor_alarm AS monitorAlarm from mr_nodes_monitor where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into mr_nodes_monitor
schedule_id,
node_id,
monitor_date,
monitor_ymd,
monitor_hour,
monitor_minute,
monitor_second,
monitor_tps,
monitor_alarm,

#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{monitorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{monitorYmd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{monitorHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{monitorMinute,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{monitorSecond,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{monitorAlarm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update mr_nodes_monitor update mr_nodes_monitor
id = #{mrNodesMonitor.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
schedule_id = #{mrNodesMonitor.scheduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
node_id = #{mrNodesMonitor.nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitor_date = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
monitor_ymd = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorYmd,jdbcType=CHAR},
monitor_hour = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_minute = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorMinute,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_second = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorSecond,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_tps = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorTps,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_alarm = #{mrNodesMonitor.monitorAlarm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
